sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCICLI, a city of the island of Sicily, in the province of Noto. It stands on a river of the same name, in a hollow way between two lofty rocks which terminate in the sea near the small harbour of Petershaven. It is in a humid atmosphere, but contains 10,500 inhabitants, who are industriously employed in various manufactures of cloth, pottery-ware, and leather.
